title: 21.5'' 2012 iMac white image on screen
message:
Hello, i have a 21.5'' 2012 iMac with white distorted image on screen, i opened it and it looks that the connectors of the lcd cable are a little bit bent, i assume is the tipical person with no knowledge pulling on the screen without realizing that it's still attached.

My silly question is, since i do not have another screen or cable, just to confirm it, is it posible to connect a Macbook Air on it and test if there's image?

Thanks, i'm sure this is a very easy one to answer.

title: 21.5'' 2012 iMac white image on screen
message: Where do you want to connect the MacBook Air?

title: 21.5'' 2012 iMac white image on screen
message: I mean a Macbook Air screen, if the lcd connector is the same

title: 21.5'' 2012 iMac white image on screen
message: Did you compare connectors layout in schematic???
